name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How to Win Friends and Influence People

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes the main tenants of How to Win Friends and Influence People when a new tab is opened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How to Win Friends and Influence People is a great book by Dale Carnegie. This extension overwrites the content of a new Chrome tab with the content headings from the book. It serves to act as a reminder during everyday browsing.
